meanings.sent3: Yer shoes are dancing by themselves!
meanings.sent4: The wind whispered secrets to yer ears.
meanings.sent5: Yer smile brightens up the room.

meanings.sent2: Are yer coming to the party?
meanings.sent3: Yer the fastest runner in the school!
meanings.sent4: In the mirror, yer reflection smiles back.
meanings.sent5: Yer laughter fills the air with joy.
